languages.text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Броня — один из основных параметров, который снижает получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Представляет собой процент, на который экипировка сокращает урон после {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} при каждом {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} по персонажу.

traits.locale_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}damage deflection{/g} every time the character is hit.

It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Броня — один из основных параметров, который снижает получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}. Представляет собой процент, на который экипировка сокращает урон после {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} при каждом попадании по персонажу.

Броня — один из основных параметров, который снижает получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}. Представляет собой процент, на который экипировка сокращает урон после {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} при каждом попадании по персонажу.

languages.text: Rüstung ist einer der Parameter, der den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} reduziert. Er zeigt den Prozentsatz des Schadens an, der durch die Rüstung des Charakters reduziert wird und wird nach der {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} jedes Mal abgezogen, wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird.
languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} ist einer der Parameter, der den eingehenden {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} reduziert. Er zeigt den Prozentsatz des Schadens an, der durch die Rüstung des Charakters reduziert wird und wird nach der {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} jedes Mal abgezogen, wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird.

languages.text: L'armure est l'un des paramètres permettant de réduire les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis. Ce paramètre indique le pourcentage de dégâts absorbé par l'armure du personnage et déduit après {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des dégâts chaque fois que le personnage est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g}.
languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} est un paramètre qui permet de réduire les {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} subis. Ce paramètre indique le pourcentage de dégâts qui est réduit par l'armure du personnage et qui est déduit après {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des dégâts chaque fois que le personnage est {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touché{/g}.

languages.text: 护甲属性可以降低受到的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。每当角色被攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，伤害会先根据角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}扣除，之后再根据角色的护甲百分比来降低。
languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}属性可以降低受到的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。每当角色被攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}时，伤害会先根据角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}扣除，之后再根据角色的护甲百分比来降低。

languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}damage deflection{/g} every time the character is hit.

languages.text: La armadura es uno de los parámetros que reducen el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido. Muestra el porcentaje de daño que reduce la armadura y el que se resta tras el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de daño cada vez que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} al personaje.
languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} es uno de los parámetros que reducen el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} recibido. Muestra el porcentaje de daño que reduce la armadura y el que se resta tras el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de daño cada vez que {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactan{/g} al personaje.

languages.text: アーマーは受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を低減するパラメータの一つである。キャラクターのアーマーにより低減されたダメージのパーセンテージを示し、キャラクターに攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたびにダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフクレション{/g}の後に差し引かれる。
languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}は受ける{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を低減するパラメータの一つである。キャラクターのアーマーにより低減されたダメージのパーセンテージを示し、キャラクターに攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}するたびにダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフクレション{/g}の後に差し引かれる。

languages.text: Zırh, gelen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} azaltan parametrelerden biridir. Karakterin zırhı tarafından azaltılan hasar yüzdesini gösterir ve karaktere her {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g}, hasar {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerinin ardından düşürülür.
languages.original_text: Armour is one of the parameters that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It shows the percentage of damage that is reduced by the character's armour and is deducted after damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} every time the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.
